name: GetCampaignMessages
description:
Retrieve message deliveries from a campaign.

Fetch information on individual message deliveries from a specific campaign over a specified time range. Use parameters like `start_ts` and `end_ts` to refine the data to a specific period.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign to fetch message deliveries from.

value_schema.description: The ID of the campaign that you want to trigger or return information about.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token indicating the starting point for the page of results to return. Use the `next` property from previous responses.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve per page. It determines the number of message deliveries returned in a single API response.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: message_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of item for metrics (e.g., email, webhook, slack, etc.). Defaults to all types if empty.

value_schema.description: The type of item you want to return metrics for. When empty, the response contains metrics for all possible types.

parameters.name: metrics_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the metrics you want to retrieve, such as 'sent', 'opened', or 'clicked'.

value_schema.description: Determines the metric(s) you want to return.

parameters.name: beginning_timestamp
parameters.description: The starting timestamp for the query to filter messages from a specific time.

value_schema.description: The beginning timestamp for your query.

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The ending timestamp for your query to specify the end of the time range for retrieving message deliveries.

value_schema.description: The ending timestamp for your query.

parameters.name: return_drafts
parameters.description: Set to true to return drafts rather than active/sent messages.

value_schema.description: If true, your request returns drafts rather than active/sent messages.
